member_organisations: We have approximately 400 members made up of a mix of individuals and small enterprises.
fields_of_interest: Business and Industry, Digital economy and society, Transport
eu_initiatives: EASA Opinion 01/2018 and all related matters including Airspace management, training, BVLOS Operations etc.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
ARPAS UK is a member of: 
 
The UK CAA's NATMAC Committee 
The UK CAA's Finance Advisory Committee 
The Royal Aeronautical Club's UAS sub group
relevant_communication: Represented on numerous other aviation trade associations, CAA committees and involved in initiatives across the UAS sector.
goals__remit: To represent our members interests in the Unmanned Aerial Vehicles industry, whether as Operators, Manufacturers, Training, Airspace Management, Flight Crew or any other aspect.
